attributes.action: Allow Children to get a wage for going to school in Secondary School.
attributes.additional_details: on them to try and keep up and look for ways to find these revision materials. Hindering their learning.
attributes.background: Kids in Secondary school are getting more stressed about the resources needed to revise from. If they have enough money, they'll be able to buy textbooks and other revision material such as flash cards. Especially for children who families aren't totally financially stable, this puts more stress

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "allow Children to get a wage for going to school in Secondary School".

If you'd like all children attending secondary school to be paid an allowance by the Government, you could start a new petition asking for that.
